full_description: Date of first symptoms of the case.
notes: Required field. The date must be less than or equal to the entry and form filling date.
Required field. The date must be less than or equal to the entry date.

full_description: Date when the patient was hospitalized.
notes: Required field. The date must be greater than or equal to the date of first symptoms.
Essential field.
Essential field. Enabled if the case outcome is Cured or Death.

full_description: Was the patient admitted to ICU?
notes: Essential field.
Essential field. Enabled if the patient was admitted to ICU.
Essential field. Enabled if the patient was admitted to ICU.

full_description: Did the patient use ventilatory support?
notes: Essential field.

full_description: Did the patient receive COVID-19 vaccine?
notes: Required field.
Essential field. Enabled if the patient received COVID-19 vaccine.
Essential field. Enabled if the patient received COVID-19 vaccine.
Essential field. Enabled if the patient received COVID-19 vaccine.

full_description: Was the patient vaccinated against flu in the last campaign?
notes: Essential field.

full_description: Date of last flu vaccine dose taken by the patient.
notes: Essential field. Enabled if the patient was vaccinated against flu.

value_options: 1-SRAG by influenza, 2-SRAG by other respiratory virus, 3-SRAG by other etiological agent, 4-SRAG unspecified, 5-SRAG by COVID-19
notes: Required field.
Essential field. The system warns if the value is not 'Yes', as the record may not meet the case definition.

full_description: Age reported by the patient when date of birth is unknown.
notes: Required field. Age should be automatically calculated if date of birth is provided.
Required field.
Required if country of residence is Brazil.

full_description: Does the patient have any risk factor?
notes: Essential field.
Essential demographic field. Coded as per Brazilian standards.
